title: Game crashes before loading screen.
body:
https://s10.postimg.io/dws43xi4p/perfect.png

Whenever I get out of champion select this appears after few seconds of black screen. Can someone help?

replies.body: A black screen on the loading screen like this suggest a network issue having trouble connecting to the game server, and the error message seems to affirm that.  I suggest going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix up you network, and get back in game.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Yes, I do not have any issues with my network at all. My phone's connection is fine, and everything on my PC that requires internet connection works fine as well. Anyways, what am I supposed to do? I did the hextech repair tool scan and there is a triangle with an exclamation mark right to the right of it. The same applies to game. I did scan it around 3 times and at the last try I forced repatch and is currently download 2 GB worth of data, half of what it required the first time I actually installed League. I will get back to you once the repatch is finished.

Being able to connect to other venues doesn't mean that your network can't have issues connecting to our servers specifically.  Repatching or repairing won't necessarily resolve this as the issue may be with your network and not game files.  You can use the hextech repair tool to configure your firewall settings, but that's all I would advise with the tool at this time.  Selecting to troubleshoot with the suggestions provided is totally your call, of course.  Best of luck!

I have the same problem here, my game will lauch but i will not get to the champion loading screen as it gets disconnected like in the initial screenshot.

My girlfriend however, who is using the same network as me, is able to play just fine. As someone else suggested above, it might be due to the fact that eune and euw are not aligned if it comes to patch timings. 

I play on both eune and west whereas my girlfriend only plays on eune, perhaps thats the problem.

I'm giving up for now, but I think you should take a look into this as many people have been facing this kind of problem (look at other's replies to this post).
